from sqlalchemy import text
from backend.models.database import async_session

async def fix\(\):
    async with async_session\(\) as db:
        await db.execute\(text\(''ALTER TABLE skills DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS ck_skills_category''\)\)
        await db.execute\(text\(""ALTER TABLE skills ADD CONSTRAINT ck_skills_category CHECK \(category IN \(''technical'', ''language'', ''tool'', ''soft'', ''other'', ''certification'', ''framework''\)\)""\)\)
        await db.commit\(\)
        print\(''Constraint updated''\)
